Body: Description: Hi Fisrt of all i'm sorry to create a new ticket. I've checked the custom rules in PingCastle.exe.config but i need some support to add a custom rule on DoListObject to increase oradad level. Could you help me ? Best regards
Next Steps Updated: Wait for customer to follow instructions to configure the custom rule
What We've Learned Updated: Customer need to add a custom rule on DoListObject

Next Steps Updated: Asking Joe about this custom rule

Wait for customer to follow instructions to configure the custom rule
What We've Learned Updated: Customer need to add a custom rule on DoListObject - This can't be done in Auditor version. Just Pro or Enterprise.
Next Steps Updated: Wait for customer to understand they can't modify rules or create custom, as they are using Auditor version.
Next Steps Updated: Wait for Account Manager to contact the customer to talk about the Pro license.
